metadata.name: Wired Science
metadata.summary: A science series that brings the magazine's award-winning journalism to public television.
metadata.description: Take the DNA of Wired magazine, the first word on how science and technology are changing the world. Add the giant-robot might of PBS. Result: WIRED Science, a science series that brings the magazine's award-winning journalism, groundbreaking design and irreverent attitude to public television.
metadata.keywords: PBS, Wired Science, science, WIRED, technology, design
